body_html:
Updated to explicitly close the writer in the example. (this should work on 0.7)

I wouldn't doubt that the file is properly closed on the Python object being dereferenced. I'm afraid of people copying the pattern and leading to unintentional leaks.

I'm OK with this being closed and not merged but I think it'd be good to highlight that TFRecordWriter should be closed.

body:
Updated to explicitly close the writer in the example. (this should work on 0.7)

I wouldn't doubt that the file is properly closed on the Python object being dereferenced. I'm afraid of people copying the pattern and leading to unintentional leaks.

I'm OK with this being closed and not merged but I think it'd be good to highlight that `TFRecordWriter` should be closed.
